alert.note: Alert for Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:46PM EDT until June 15 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTHWESTERN MARION AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 1146 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hawthorne to 7 miles west of Citra to 7 miles northwest of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Citra, Hawthorne, Sparr, Anthony, Rochelle, Cross Creek, Micanopy, Reddick and McIntosh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
